resources.string: Welcome to Perfect Paper Passwords. To begin using this application, you will need to create one or more card sets. You may tap the New button above to create a new card set. Once you have created a card set, this screen will display the list of available card sets in the database.
"Passcode at xxx copied to the clipboard.
Are you sure you wish to clear your password? Doing so will delete all data from the database!
Strikes for all cards in this card set have been cleared.
ERROR: Strikes for the current card set could not be cleared.
Strikes for the current card have been cleared.
ERROR: Strikes for the current card could not be cleared.
Are you sure you wish to clear all strike-out data from the card set \"xxx\"?
The strike-out data for card set \"xxx\" has been successfully deleted.
ERROR: The strike-out data for card set \"xxx\" could not be deleted.
Are you sure you wish to delete the card set \"xxx\"?
The card set \"xxx\" has been successfully deleted.
ERROR: The card set \"xxx\" could not be deleted.
Are you sure you wish to delete all card set data? This cannot be undone!
All card set data has been successfully deleted.
ERROR: Some card set data could not be deleted.
Your new password was set successfully.
ERROR: Your new password could not be set.
ERROR: Your password could not be cleared.
Card set \"xxx\" has been successfully renamed to \"yyy\".
ERROR: Card set \"xxx\" could not be renamed.
ERROR: Card set names must be non-empty.
Card set \"xxx\" has been saved successfully.
ERROR: Card set \"xxx\" could not be saved to the database.

You can specify a password to control access to this application. Passwords are stored using a one-way cryptographic hash and therefore cannot be recovered. If you forget your password, you can chose to clear it at the password prompt, but doing so will destroy all card set data in the database. You can also clear your password here after you have authenticated without destroying your data.
ERROR: The specified card set could not be found.
ERROR: The database was cleared, but the password could not be cleared.
ERROR: The database could not be cleared. The password has not been cleared.
ERROR: Alphabet field cannot be empty. Each character may only be used once.
The password you have entered is invalid. Please try again.
ERROR: Number of columns field must contain a positive integer greater than 0 and less than 27.
ERROR: Number of rows field must contain a positive integer greater than zero.
ERROR: Sequence key must be a hexadecimal string 64 characters long.
ERROR: The number of columns times the passcode length must be less than 53. Please change one of these values.
ERROR: Name field cannot be empty.
ERROR: An error has occurred while launching the new card set activity.
ERROR: This function has not been implemented yet. Sorry!

This program uses code from the jPPP project by Kurt Nelson, which in turn is based a JME phone client by John Graham-Cumming. jPPP is released under the same license as this application: GNU GPL v3. The original Perfect Paper Passwords system was written and designed by Steve Gibson.
